Hi there, I'm Leke Abiodun.

I love writing codes that solve unique problems and create solutions that drive business growth, I'm a performance-driven and motivated Full-Stack Developer. PHP is no longer sucks! These days you will mostly find me building web applications with PHP, Laravel, Livewire, AlpineJS and TailwindCSS.

Some interesting projects I've worked on include:

  • FinTech
  • Payroll system
  • Job recruitment portal
  • E-Commerce rental place
  • School management system
  • Thrift collection management

I love technology, when I'm not coding you will mostly find me with my love ones or discussing and teaching about technology, software, negotiation, productivity, music etc.
